Penetrating_Ray_Normal.display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. Like all Sniper attacks it will be interrupted if you're attacked. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
Penetrating_Ray_Normal.display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Penetrating_Ray_Normal.display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. Like all Sniper attacks it will be interrupted if you're attacked. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
Penetrating_Ray_Normal.display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

VictoryRush_Base.display_help: The defeat of an opponent gives your team a rush of adrenaline. The excitement of your victory increases the recovery and reduces the endurance cost of your powers. This effect extends to your teammates as well. The total strength of this bonus is dependent upon the rank of the enemy on which this is cast, with Archvillains and Giant Monsters providing the greatest benefit. This power does not stack with multiple castings, though you will always benefit from the most powerful buff which has been applied to you.
VictoryRush_Base.display_target_help: You have been inspired by your team's victory over an opponent. Your recovery has been increased and your powers will cost less endurance to execute. This effect grows stronger depending upon the power of the foe you vanquished.

messages.display_victim_hit: Your recovery and endurance costs have been improved by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Water_Jet_Normal.display_help: You spray a concentrated torrent of water toward your target that causes High Cold and Smashing damage as well as reducing your target's movement speed. Hail_of_Debris.display_help: You are a hail of debris created by a nearby Vortex. Enemies caught within your field of effect suffer smashing and lethal damage over time, as well as reduced movement speeds, damage resistance and an inability to fly.
Hail_of_Debris.display_target_help: You are caught in a dangerous hail of debris and are suffering both lethal and smashing damage over time. Additionally, movement is impaired, damage resistance is reduced and you are unable to fly. This effect only persists for as long as you remain within the debris field.

Whirlwind.display_help: You are a vortex, and as such you create a constant whirlwind effect around yourself. Any foes that come near you will be struck by debris from your funnel cloud, suffering smashing damage. Visibility is also reduced, lowering the chance to hit of affected targets. Additionally, flying foes will be brought to the ground.
Whirlwind.display_target_help: You are within the range of the whirlwind continuously emanating from a Vortex. You are suffering smashing damage, reduced chance to hit, and are unable to fly. You may also be knocked into the air.

Hail_of_Debris.display_help: You release a debris cloud that descends upon a targeted foe. This foe, and all those in the affected area, suffer smashing damage as long as they remain within the debris column. Additionally, these targets suffer reduced chance to hit, resistance to damage and movement speed. Flying targets are knocked to the ground and unable to fly. You are only able to use this if the Pressure level of your creator is 3 or less.
Hail_of_Debris.display_target_help: You are caught in a dangerous hail of debris!

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} creates a deadly {PowerName} at your location!

Pressurization.display_help: As your creator manipulates pressure, this has an effect on you. The more pressure has been manipulated, the greater your chance of striking with critical damage. The trade-off, however, is that once pressure manipulation exceeds a certain point, you will be unable to use Hail of Debris.

Resistance.display_help: You are naturally immune to smashing, lethal and psionic damage, and have moderate resistance to all other forms of damage. Healing is only half as effective on you as it would otherwise be. You are extremely resistant to mind affecting status effects, like Terrorize, Confuse, and Sleep, as well as most movement status effects, like Knock, Repel and Slow. You are only strongly resistant to Hold, Immobilize and Stun, however.
Zombies are resistant to Smashing, Cold, Negative Energy, and Toxic Damage. They are also resistant to Disorientation, Fear and Sleep. However, they are slow.
Resistance.display_target_help: Zombie are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy and Psionic damage, but vulnerable to energy, fire and lethal damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Cold, Negative, Psionic, Slow
